item.title: Slayer Help! [Pi]
item.dc:creator: @heatrn11 heatrn11
item.description:
@heatrn11 wrote:

[quote=“JCor9, post:1, topic:431044”]Ok so im trying to fix the slayer code from it being combat level to require higher task to Slayer level heres my code

public void giveTask() { if (c.combatLevel >= 3) giveTask(1); else if (c.combatLevel >= 75 && c.combatLevel <= 90) giveTask(2); else if (c.combatLevel > 91 && c.combatLevel <= 110) giveTask(3); else if (c.combatLevel >= 111 && c.combatLevel <= 138) giveTask(4); else giveTask(2); }

I get Errors when i change it to this

public void giveTask() { if (c.combatLevel >= 1) giveTask(1); else if (c.slayerLevel >= 35 && c.slayerLevel <= 60) giveTask(2); else if (c.slayerLevel >= 61 && c.slayerLevel <= 80) giveTask(3); else if (c.slayerLevel >= 81 && c.slayerLevel <= 99) giveTask(4); else giveTask(2); }[/quote]
the original codes are prob already declared in another folder…

Read full topic

item.title: Slayer Help! [Pi]
item.dc:creator: @JCor9 JCor9
item.description:
@JCor9 wrote:

Ok so im trying to fix the slayer code from it being combat level to require higher task to Slayer level heres my code

public void giveTask() { if (c.combatLevel >= 3) giveTask(1); else if (c.combatLevel >= 75 && c.combatLevel <= 90) giveTask(2); else if (c.combatLevel > 91 && c.combatLevel <= 110) giveTask(3); else if (c.combatLevel >= 111 && c.combatLevel <= 138) giveTask(4); else giveTask(2); }

I get Errors when i change it to this

public void giveTask() { if (c.combatLevel >= 1) giveTask(1); else if (c.slayerLevel >= 35 && c.slayerLevel <= 60) giveTask(2); else if (c.slayerLevel >= 61 && c.slayerLevel <= 80) giveTask(3); else if (c.slayerLevel >= 81 && c.slayerLevel <= 99) giveTask(4); else giveTask(2); }

Read full topic
